text: If I record my own data, using the market recorder, and then use it for backtesting, there is a problem with in the market cache, as it expects some runners variables to be populated before it starts doing stuff with market books. Has anyone else encountered this?

user_profile.real_name: Jon Jon Jon Jon Jon Jon Jon Jon
user_profile.name: fcmisc

elements.text: If I record my own data, using the market recorder, and then use it for backtesting, there is a problem with in the market cache, as it expects some runners variables to be populated before it starts doing stuff with market books. Has anyone else encountered this?

text:
Also, when I record data, I don't get the runner names in the "runners" list.

e.g.

`{"op": "mcm", "clk": null, "pt": 1601645866037, "mc": [{"id": "1.173718127", "marketDefinition": {"bspMarket": true, "turnInPlayEnabled": true, "persistenceEnabled": true, "marketBaseRate": 5, "eventId": "30044214", "eventTypeId": "7", "numberOfWinners": 1, "bettingType": "ODDS", "marketType": "WIN", "marketTime": "2020-10-02T15:30:00.000Z", "suspendTime": "2020-10-02T15:30:00.000Z", "bspReconciled": false, "complete": true, "inPlay": false, "crossMatching": true, "runnersVoidable": false, "numberOfActiveRunners": 8, "betDelay": 0, "status": "OPEN", "runners": [{"adjustmentFactor": 29.718, "status": "ACTIVE", "sortPriority": 1, "id": 26792853}, {"adjustmentFactor": 10.481, "status": "ACTIVE", "sortPriority": 2, "id": 27351200}, {"adjustmentFactor": 18.683, "status": "ACTIVE", "sortPriority": 3, "id": 27274531}, {"adjustmentFactor": 20.62, "status": "ACTIVE", "sortPriority": 4, "id": 20661160}, {"adjustmentFactor": 6.322, "status": "ACTIVE", "sortPriority": 5, "id": 23041464}, {"adjustmentFactor": 1.376, "status": "ACTIVE", "sortPriority": 6, "id": 11212161}, {"adjustmentFactor": 9.915, "status": "ACTIVE", "sortPriority": 7, "id": 17488795}, {"adjustmentFactor": 2.886, "status": "ACTIVE", "sortPriority": 8, "id": 576899}, {"adjustmentFactor": 2.381, "status": "REMOVED", "sortPriority": 9, "removalDate": "2020-10-02T07:40:18.000Z", "id": 9648649}], "regulators": ["MR_INT"], "venue": "Fontwell", "countryCode": "GB", "discountAllowed": true, "timezone": "Europe/London", "openDate": "2020-10-02T11:30:00.000Z", "version": 3391992038, "raceType": "Hurdle", "priceLadderDefinition": {"type": "CLASSIC"}}}]}`
